Customers place orders at regular intervals. The faster you fulfill the orders, the faster the customers' visits.
When the heart gauge is depleted, the customer leaves.
Press the customer's receipt to view detailed information.
The price is displayed at the bottom. Intensity does not give money.
Check the recipe before starting the preparation. When an order comes in, the order receipt will be displayed in the upper left corner.
Press the order receipt to view detailed information. Pay attention to the order! Thieves don't pay!
Complete the cooking by stacking the ingredients in order of recipe. Press the Trash button on the bottom right to discard the miscooked food.
When the dish is ready, ring the bell and serve it to the guest. If the finished dish is different from the recipe, the ingredients will be restored to their original state.
